version_description:
v 1.1 - Continue function change 
Title screen glitch fix
finish mode bug fix
minor bug fix

New Feature:  Added Turbo(Hard difficult) mode , Added Costume.
Added IAP.(Remove ads)
Added Game Center Achivements. 
Added Score visible option
Resource Optimization.
Italy Ver. title fixed.
and many bug fixed.

- New episode 'Super Counter of death' mode added
- Super mode Ranking, achievement added
- Floor select function added
- Tutorial, prologue scene replay function added
- Super gauge added,  Super Death Counter added. 
- Super gauge booster added
- Added new costume
- 2 New Playable Characters added (IAP)
- ingame button display method changed
- fixed Portuguese, French title.
- fixed lot of glitches
